2024 CEO Summit

Insights from Vista's CEO Summit

We believe connecting CEOs and executives from across our companies and providing access to peers who have solved the same challenges are some of the greatest advantages we offer as an investor. Explore key takeaways from the 60+ CEOs who attended and how our enterprise software portfolio is thinking about generative artificial intelligence.

Read Key Takeaways Read About GenAI

CAIA: Educational Alpha Podcast

David Breach on Private Market Enterprise Software Investing

David Breach, President and COO of Vista Equity Partners, joined Bill Kelly, CEO of CAIA, on the Educational Alpha Podcast. They discussed the transformative nature of enterprise software investments, the implications of market shifts and the strategies for successful asset management.

Listen Here

S&P Global: Fixed Income in 15 Podcast

Robert F. Smith on How To Build a Culture of Success

Robert F. Smith, Founder, Chairman and CEO of Vista Equity Partners, joined Doug Peterson, CEO at S&P Global and host Joe Cass on the Fixed Income in 15 Podcast. Their discussion focused on how to build a culture of success in business, the evolution of GenAI and the growth of private markets.

Listen Here

Pensions & Investments: Investment Insights

Tapping Into Enterprise Software Expertise in Private Credit

David Flannery, President and Senior Managing Director of Vista Credit Partners, speaks with Pensions & Investments in their Investment Insights newsletter about Vista's expertise in enterprise software and highly-disciplined approach on selecting the right opportunities.
